notice.ch: 修過天文學導論、天文學、天文物理學導論者不得選修

remark.ch: 修過天文學導論、天文學、天文物理學導論者不得選修

goal.ch: 當遠古的人類在滿天星斗下凝望著天空，人類便開始學習從浩瀚的宇宙來思索人生的意義。本課程從觀察的角度，幫助學生來領略宇宙的奧秘。希望能透過分享各種美麗的天文影像與故事，讓學生了解宇宙的基本規律，同時感受生命在宇宙中的意義。
goal.en: This course is aimed to provide an overview of astronomy, and will be taught entirely in Chinese. For a similar course that taught entirely in English, please check out the following course in Fall Semester: “GS 4451 -- An Introduction to Modern Astronomy“

outline.ch:
週次 課程進度與內容
1課程簡介
2天文學簡介與天文歷史
3認識天球與星座
4     日常生活中的天文學
5天文望遠鏡簡介
6太陽系天體
7校際活動週(放假溫書)
8期中考
9認識我們的恆星:太陽
10星星的特性，誕生與演化
11奇特天體:黑洞,中子星和白矮星
12我們的銀河系
13星系世界
14宇宙論
15尋找系外行星與外星生命
16期末考
outline.en:
Week 1 Course Introduction
Week 2 Introduction to Astronomy and a Brief History
Week 3 Celestial Sphere and Constellations
Week 4 Everyday Astronomy
Week 5 Telescopes
Week 6 Solar System
Week 7 (no class)
Week 8 Midterm
Week 9 Understand our Sun
Week 10 Stars and Stellar Evolution
Week 11 Black holes, Neutron Stars and White Dwarf
Week 12 Our Milky Way
Week 13 Galaxies
Week 14 Cosmology
Week 15 Extra-Solar Planets
Week 16 Final

textbook.ch:
“Foundations of Astronomy”, M. Seed ＆ D. Backman, Cengage Learning
“21st Century Astronomy”, L. Kay, S. Palen ＆ G. Blumenthal, W. W. Norton ＆ Company
“The Cosmos: Astronomy in the New Millennium”, J. Pasachoff ＆ A. Filippenko, Cambridge University Press
textbook.en:
“Foundations of Astronomy”, M. Seed ＆ D. Backman, Cengage Learning
“21st Century Astronomy”, L. Kay, S. Palen ＆ G. Blumenthal, W. W. Norton ＆ Company
“The Cosmos: Astronomy in the New Millennium”, J. Pasachoff ＆ A. Filippenko, Cambridge University Press

ch: 學制:限學士班。身份:限不限。指定課程:必須禁修CC0203。
en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.identity:Unlimited Only. Specific Subject Requirements:禁修CC0203 only.
